Content:: This article documents the chronology and epidemiology of SARS-CoV-2, the virus that causes the coronavirus disease 2019 (COVID-19) and is responsible for the COVID-19 pandemic, in July 2021. The first human cases of COVID-19 were identified in Wuhan, China, in December 2019. World Health Organization weekly report:[31] World Health Organization weekly report:[82] World Health Organization weekly report:[129] World Health Organization weekly report:[178] There is no new countries with new cases of the COVID-19 pandemic during July 2021. By the end of July, only the following countries and territories have not reported any cases of SARS-CoV-2 infections: Asia Europe Oceania
Title: Timeline of the COVID-19 pandemic in July 2021 - Wikipedia
